name: Skate & Slash
description:
Small prototype I made in ~20 hours in Unity for a school project.

Use your Skateboard-Sword to do tricks,  evade obstacles, use ramps, slay enemies and beat the boss!

How to play
  • [A] move left
  • [D] move right
  • [R] restart game
  • [Space] jump
  • [Left arrow] or [Right arrow] attack (spin skateboard)
  • You can only kill enemies while doing tricks, using ramps or being in the air
  • Reach the end of the road to slay the boss

If you are interested in checking the unity project you can find it here: https://github.com/Mick76/SkateAndSlash
